context_bundle.summary: PhiBroker - HTTP message broker for PhiVector agents. Replaces WM_COPYDATA/file-based messaging with clean REST API. 986KB Rust binary on port 7700. Supports long-polling, auto agent registration, message queues.

onboarding.quick_start: Start: X:\\mcp-servers\\phibroker\\target\\release\\phibroker.exe | Port: 7700 | Send: POST /send {from,to,body,eof} | Receive: GET /receive/{agent}?wait=true | Status: GET /status | Module: Import-Module X:\\mcp-servers\\phibroker\\PhiBroker.psm1
known_errors: Connection refused - broker not running, start with Start-PhiBroker.ps1
X: drive not mounted - mount CARBYNE.vhdx first
